content: Bord of Governors of the Federal Reserve System   8  January 19, 2017                                 Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System                           7  Figure 7 FOMC Participants’ Assessments of Appropriate Policy  and Taylor Rule Prescriptions with Alternative Estimates of R*   0.0  0.5  1.0  1.5  2.0  2.5  3.0  3.5  4.0  4.5  5.0  5.5  6.0  0.0  0.5  1.0  1.5  2.0  2.5  3.0  3.5  4.0  4.5  5.0  5.5  6.0 Taylor rule (R* = 2) Taylor rule (R* = 1) Taylor rule (R* = 0) Median of projections  2016 2017 2018 2019  December 2016 SEP projections Percent  Note: For the definition of the solid circles, see the note to Figure 5. Source:  For the three versions of the Taylor rule, Federal Reserve Board staff calculations; for the projections (solid circles) and median of projections, Summary of Economic Projections (SEP), December 2016, available at www.federalreserve.gov/monetarypolicy/fomccalendar.htm.
